alert.note: Alert for Allendale; Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Hurricane Local Statement issued September 30 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: This product covers southeast South Carolina and southeast Georgia **IAN WILL CONTINUE TO MOVE AWAY FROM OUR AREA** NEW INFORMATION --------------- * CHANGES TO WATCHES AND WARNINGS: - All watches and warnings have been canceled * CURRENT WATCHES AND WARNINGS: - None * STORM INFORMATION: - - 34.7N 79.3W - Storm Intensity 60 mph - Movement North or 350 degrees at 15 mph SITUATION OVERVIEW ------------------ Ian has moved away from our area. POTENTIAL IMPACTS ----------------- * WIND: Little to no impacts are anticipated at this time across southeast South Carolina and southeast Georgia. * SURGE: Little to no impacts are anticipated at this time across southeast South Carolina and southeast Georgia. * FLOODING RAIN: Little to no impacts are anticipated at this time across southeast South Carolina and southeast Georgia. * TORNADOES: Little to no impacts are anticipated at this time across southeast South Carolina and southeast Georgia. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS ---------------------------------- * ADDITIONAL SOURCES OF INFORMATION: - For information on appropriate preparations see ready.gov - For information on creating an emergency plan see getagameplan.org - For additional disaster preparedness information see redcross.org NEXT UPDATE ----------- As it pertains to this event...this will be the last local statement issued by the National Weather Service in Charleston SC regarding the effects of tropical cyclone hazards upon the area.

area.areaDesc: Allendale; Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Dorchester; Hampton; Inland Berkeley; Inland Colleton; Inland Jasper; Tidal Berkeley
